message.content:
We need first to “extract” only the sale‐transactions (the ones whose type is “Sale …”) and then add up the “after_tax_amount” fields – which is how the “main business revenue” (sales revenue) is computed.

Below is a short outline of our reasoning:

1. Among the many transactions (which include Initial, Purchase, Expense, Interest, Transfer, Fixed Assets etc.) the “Sale…” rows record income from the main business. In our table the “Sale” rows include a column “after_tax_amount” that represents the net revenue from a sale (after deducting any tax).

2. We list each sale row and note its “after_tax_amount”:
 • Sale20240102001:  53836.94 
 • Sale20240103003:  106822.42 
 • Sale20240103004:  248440.64 
 • Sale20240104006:  419313.85 
 • Sale20240104007:  211166.27 
 • Sale20240105008:  66304.56 
 • Sale20240105009:  124380.93 
 • Sale20240106012:  36984.22 
 • Sale20240107013:  23775.88 
 • Sale20240107014:  216551.34 
 • Sale20240108015:  398585.41 
 • Sale20240108016:  528043.87 
 • Sale20240109017:  49628.00 
 • Sale20240109018:  51589.90 
 • Sale20240110019:  76606.89 
 • Sale20240111021:  180427.43 
 • Sale20240112022:  245613.55 
 • Sale20240112023:  130442.28 
 • Sale20240113026:  38159.50 
 • Sale20240113027:  57121.12 
 • Sale20240114029:  233189.79 
 • Sale20240114030:  13269.74 
 • Sale20240115032:  58564.91 
 • Sale20240116033:  190976.68 
 • Sale20240116034:  21504.33 
 • Sale20240117035:  22725.00 
 • Sale20240118038:  21833.91 
 • Sale20240119041:  46525.66 
 • Sale20240119042:  360925.60 
 • Sale20240120044:  47059.75 
 • Sale20240121046:  132195.30 
 • Sale20240121047:  11470.34 
 • Sale20240122048:  24816.34 
 • Sale20240123049:  113344.29 
 • Sale20240123050:  340289.49 
 • Sale20240124051:  93057.21 
 • Sale20240124052:  51125.39 
 • Sale20240125053:  24831.06 
 • Sale20240125054:  105832.92 
 • Sale20240126056:  60660.78 
 • Sale20240127057:  44188.45 
 • Sale20240128059:  43920.97 
 • Sale20240128060:  10966.18 
 • Sale20240129061:  130410.03
 
3. Adding these 44 (or 45) numbers step‐by‐step gives a total of approximately 5,467,479.12.

Thus, the “Main Business Revenue” value in the income statement is about 5,467,479.12.

The answer in the requested json format is then:

------------------------------------------------

{
  "solution": {
    "Main Business Revenue": "5467479.12"
  }
} 

------------------------------------------------

Note: We took extra care by summing each “after_tax_amount” from all the sales transactions.
